mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_agent_application_record ( merchant_id, mobile, merchant_name, mark_code, oem_id, first_dealer_id, second_dealer_id, pay_time, pay_amount, level, is_deal, status )VALUES ( #{merchantId}, #{mobile}, #{merchantName}, #{markCode}, #{oemId}, #{firstDealerId}, #{secondDealerId}, #{payTime}, #{payAmount}, #{level}, #{isDeal}, #{status} )
